name: Between Us (Luiz Felipe Bustamante)
description:
A game inspired by Among Us.

The impostors need to kill all the innocents to win!

The innocents must find out who are the impostors or complete all the tasks to win!

The ideal number of players is between 4-8 people.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • R - Report
  • E - Interact
  • F - Kill
  • Tab - Show/Hide Minimap
  • Mouse - Interact with buttons and tasks

[This game is still in development! I plan on adding more fun stuff!]
